name: Wallpaper Engine
description: Use stunning live wallpapers on your desktop. Animate your own images to create new wallpapers or import videos/websites and share them on the Steam Workshop!

name: Factorio
description: Factorio is a game about building and creating automated factories to produce items of increasing complexity, within an infinite 2D world. Use your imagination to design your factory, combine simple elements into ingenious structures, and finally protect it from the creatures who don't really like you.

achievements.name: Automated cleanup
achievements.description: Deconstruct 100 objects with the construction robots.

name: Oxygen Not Included
description: Oxygen Not Included is a space-colony simulation game. Deep inside an alien space rock your industrious crew will need to master science, overcome strange new lifeforms, and harness incredible space tech to survive, and possibly, thrive.

achievements.name: Turn of the Century
achievements.description: Reach cycle 100 with at least one living Duplicant.

achievements.name: Outdoor Renovations
achievements.description: Construct a building outside the initial starting biome.

achievements.name: Space Race
achievements.description: Launch your first rocket into space.

achievements.name: One Year, to be Exact
achievements.description: Reach cycle 365.25 with a single colony.

achievements.name: Slick
achievements.description: Enter an oil biome for the first time.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Baldur’s Gate 3 is a story-rich, party-based RPG set in the universe of Dungeons & Dragons, where your choices shape a tale of fellowship and betrayal, survival and sacrifice, and the lure of absolute power.

achievements.name: Descent From Avernus
achievements.description: Take control of the nautiloid and escape the Hells.

name: Arma 3
description: Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Deploying a wide variety of single- and multiplayer content, over 20 vehicles and 40 weapons, and limitless opportunities for content creation, this is the PC’s premier military game. Authentic, diverse, open - Arma 3 sends you to war.

achievements.name: This is War
achievements.description: Started your first Arma 3 scenario - welcome!

achievements.name: First Deployment
achievements.description: Completed the Bootcamp campaign. Get ready for your next deployment!

name: Counter-Strike 2
description: For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, one shaped by millions of players from across the globe. And now the next chapter in the CS story is about to begin. This is Counter-Strike 2.

name: Squad
description: Squad is a tactical FPS that provides authentic combat experiences through teamwork, communication, and realistic combat. It bridges the gap between arcade shooter and military realism with 100-player battles, combined-arms warfare, and base building.

name: Rising Storm/Red Orchestra 2 Multiplayer
description: Contains full Rising Storm content as well!

achievements.name: Master of Tutorials
achievements.description: Complete all of the training missions

achievements.name: Leadership Camp
achievements.description: Complete the Squad Leader training mission

name: SCUM
description: Traverse punishing environments, looting, crafting and evading the constant threats to your life. The unprecedented levels of character customization and progression are your ultimate tools for survival.

achievements.name: Lights, Camera, Action!
achievements.description: Spawn on the island for the first time

achievements.name: I shake my little tush on the catwalk

name: DayZ
description: How long can you survive a post-apocalyptic world? A land overrun with an infected "zombie" population, where you compete with other survivors for limited resources. Will you team up with strangers and stay strong together? Or play as a lone wolf to avoid betrayal? This is DayZ – this is your story.

achievements.name: Geared
achievements.description: Equipped a firearm, a melee weapon and a backpack.

achievements.name: Field cook
achievements.description: Cooked a steak on a stick.

name: Divinity: Original Sin 2
description: The critically acclaimed RPG that raised the bar, from the creators of Baldur's Gate 3. Gather your party. Master deep, tactical combat. Venture as a party of up to four - but know that only one of you will have the chance to become a God.

achievements.name: Gladiator
achievements.description: Become champion of the Fort Joy arena

name: Source Filmmaker
description: The Source Filmmaker (SFM) is the movie-making tool built and used by us here at Valve to make movies inside the Source game engine. Because the SFM uses the same assets as the game, anything that exists in the game can be used in the movie, and vice versa.

name: HELLDIVERS™ 2
description: The Galaxy’s Last Line of Offence. Enlist in the Helldivers and join the fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy in a fast, frantic, and ferocious third-person shooter.

achievements.name: Hell Dive
achievements.description: Complete an Extreme difficulty mission or higher without anyone dying.

achievements.name: Samples are a diver's best friend
achievements.description: Extract at least 15 rare samples from a mission as a team.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege is an elite, tactical team-based shooter where superior planning and execution triumph.

name: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS
description: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS, the high-stakes winner-take-all shooter that started the Battle Royale craze, is free-to-play! Drop into diverse maps, loot unique weapons and supplies, and survive in an ever-shrinking zone where every turn could be your last.

achievements.name: Pacifist
achievements.description: Reach the top 10 without killing anyone.

achievements.name: Marksman Novice
achievements.description: Kill 10 players with an assault rifle and/or a sniper rifle from over 100 meters away.

achievements.name: Blood on My Hands
achievements.description: Kill a player by any means.

name: Total War: WARHAMMER III
description: The cataclysmic conclusion to the Total War: WARHAMMER trilogy is here. Rally your forces and step into the Realm of Chaos, a dimension of mind-bending horror where the very fate of the world will be decided. Will you conquer your Daemons… or command them?

achievements.name: Talented Amateur
achievements.description: Win 10 battles during a single campaign.

achievements.name: Professional Tactician
achievements.description: Win 50 battles during a single campaign.

achievements.name: The Road to Riches
achievements.description: Playing as Cathay, complete a Caravan's journey.

name: Company of Heroes 2
description: Experience the ultimate WWII RTS platform with COH2 and its standalone expansions. This package includes the base game, which you can then upgrade by purchasing The Western Front Armies, Ardennes Assault and/or The British Forces. More info in the "About This Game" section below.

achievements.name: Attrition
achievements.description: End 25 games with a kill:death ratio greater than 2:1

achievements.name: War Footing Munitions I
achievements.description: Spend over 1500 munitions in each of 15 games

achievements.name: War Footing Fuel I
achievements.description: Spend over 750 fuel in each of 15 games

achievements.name: Fusilier
achievements.description: End 15 games with the majority of your kills from infantry (German)

name: RimWorld
description: A sci-fi colony sim driven by an intelligent AI storyteller. Generates stories by simulating psychology, ecology, gunplay, melee combat, climate, biomes, diplomacy, interpersonal relationships, art, medicine, trade, and more.

name: APB Reloaded
description: The world’s first and premier Action MMO Third Person Shooter allows you to choose between two sides of the law. Play as Enforcer or Criminal, customize your gear for the task at hand and hit the streets and play how you want in a city filled with more action this side of a Hollywood blockbuster.

achievements.name: Reinforcement
achievements.description: Earned by assisting groupmates kill 100 enemy players.

achievements.name: Help!
achievements.description: Earned by successfully calling in backup 100 times.

achievements.name: Playing Dirty...
achievements.description: Earned by killing a Prestige 5 Enforcer by shooting him in the back.

achievements.name: Bounty Hunter
achievements.description: Earned by arresting/killing 5 criminals who are notoriety 5.

name: EVE Online
description: EVE Online is a free-to-play community driven space MMO where players can choose their own path from countless different options. Experience space exploration, immense PvP and PvE battles, mining, industry and a thriving player economy in an ever-expanding sandbox.

name: Wargame: European Escalation
description: The New Fatal Error DLC includes a new 5-mission Operation and touch-screen controls.

achievements.name: Another Brick in the Wall/The Wall
achievements.description: Complete first BRUDER GEGEN BRUDER mission.

achievements.name: Redcoats
achievements.description: Complete second BRUDER GEGEN BRUDER mission.

achievements.name: Hell’s Highway

achievements.name: The Bear awakes

achievements.name: The Peacemaker

name: For Honor
description: Fight alone or with friends in For Honor, a third-person hero-based melee fighting game. Enter the chaos of war as a Knight, a Viking, a Samurai, a Wu Lin, or an Outlander. Fight in brutal PvP and team-oriented modes, or play the thrilling story campaign.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896
description: Hunt: Showdown 1896 is a new era of the addictively unforgiving extraction shooter. In corrupted backwaters lost to history, fight back alone – or with friends – against timeless evil. Twisted monsters and other ruthless Hunters stand between you and your Bounty. Risk everything as Hunt consumes you

name: Space Engineers
description: Space Engineers is a sandbox game about engineering, construction, exploration and survival in space and on planets. Players build space ships, space stations, planetary outposts of various sizes and uses, pilot ships and travel through space to explore planets and gather resources to survive.

achievements.name: Number 5 Is Alive
achievements.description: Connect your suit to power with less than 1% power remaining in Survival.

achievements.name: Going Green
achievements.description: Build 25 Solar Panels while playing in Survival Mode.

achievements.name: The Bigger They Are
achievements.description: Build more than 1,000,000 Kg of cubes.

achievements.name: The Harder They Fall
achievements.description: Destroy more than 1,000,000 Kg of cubes.

name: Team Fortress 2
description: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!

achievements.name: Team Doctor
achievements.description: Accumulate 25000 heal points as a Medic.

achievements.name: Flamethrower
achievements.description: Set five enemies on fire in 30 seconds.

achievements.name: Sentry Gunner
achievements.description: Accumulate 10 sentry gun kills with a single sentry.

achievements.name: Hard to Kill
achievements.description: Get five kills in a row without dying.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
description: A thrilling story-driven action RPG, with a rich open world, set in 15th century Medieval Europe. Experience the ultimate medieval adventure - through the eyes of young Henry - as you embark on a journey of epic proportions.

achievements.name: Déjà Vu
achievements.description: You defeated Capon during practice. Again.

achievements.name: Bohemian Sniper
achievements.description: You killed an enemy with a crossbow shot to the head at long range.

name: Call of Duty®
description: The Call of Duty® experience supports Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6, Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® III, Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® II and Call of Duty®: Warzone™.

achievements.name: Only the Beginning
achievements.description: Earn at least one Star in Co-op.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI
description: Expand your empire, advance your culture and go head-to-head against history’s greatest leaders. Will your civilization stand the test of time?

achievements.name: Game, Settler, Match
achievements.description: Win a regular game at Settler difficulty or harder

achievements.name: Irish Heartbeat
achievements.description: Win a regular game at Chieftain difficulty or harder

achievements.name: Warlording Over Others

achievements.name: Veni, vidi, vici

name: Ready or Not
description: Ready or Not is an intense, tactical, first-person shooter that depicts a modern-day world in which SWAT police units are called to defuse hostile and confronting situations.

achievements.name: First Arrest
achievements.description: Arrest your first suspect or civilian

achievements.name: The War
achievements.description: Complete ‘Thank You, Come Again’, ‘Rust Belt’ and ‘Twisted Nerve’ at C+.

achievements.name: The Left Behind
achievements.description: Complete ‘Carriers of the Vine’, ‘Sins of the Father’, ‘Ides of March’, and ‘A Lethal Obsession’ at C+.

achievements.name: The Exploited
achievements.description: Complete ‘The Spider’, ‘Valley of the Dolls’, ‘Sinuous Trail’, and '23 Megabytes a Second' at C+.

achievements.name: The Magician
achievements.description: Arrest a downed suspect only to find out they were faking it.

name: The Isle
description: Experience fierce open world survival gameplay as you attempt to stay alive on an unforgiving island inhabited by dinosaurs! Hunt. Grow. Survive.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
description: Story-driven open-world RPG that immerses you in an epic adventure in the Holy Roman Empire. Avenge your parents' death as you battle invading forces, go on game-changing quests, and make influential choices. Explore castles, forests, villages and other realistic settings in medieval Bohemia!

achievements.name: Insomniac
achievements.description: Don't sleep for two days and nights.

achievements.name: Fatso
achievements.description: Be stuffed to bursting for two days.

achievements.name: Traveller
achievements.description: Discover all locations on the map.

name: Grand Theft Auto V Legacy
description: Grand Theft Auto V for PC offers players the option to explore the award-winning world of Los Santos and Blaine County in resolutions of up to 4k and beyond, as well as the chance to experience the game running at 60 frames per second.

achievements.name: To Live or Die in Los Santos

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: EPIC FANTASY REBORN The next chapter in the highly anticipated Elder Scrolls saga arrives from the makers of the 2006 and 2008 Games of the Year, Bethesda Game Studios. Skyrim reimagines and revolutionizes the open-world fantasy epic, bringing to life a complete virtual world open for you to explore any way you choose.

name: PlanetSide 2
description: PlanetSide 2 is an all-out planetary war, where thousands of players battle as one across enormous continents. Utilize infantry, ground and air vehicles, and teamwork to destroy your enemies in this revolutionary first-person shooter on a massive scale.

name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord
description: A strategy/action RPG. Create a character, engage in diplomacy, craft, trade and conquer new lands in a vast medieval sandbox. Raise armies to lead into battle and command and fight alongside your troops in massive real-time battles using a deep but intuitive skill-based combat system.

achievements.name: Entrepreneur
achievements.description: Own a workshop and a caravan at the same time.

achievements.name: I can do it
achievements.description: Capture a town on your own.

achievements.name: I spit on your grave
achievements.description: Execute a lord that you have -100 relations with.

name: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag
description: The year is 1715. Pirates rule the Caribbean and have established their own lawless Republic where corruption, greediness and cruelty are commonplace.Among these outlaws is a brash young captain named Edward Kenway.

name: Total War: WARHAMMER II
description: Strategy gaming perfected. A breath-taking campaign of exploration, expansion and conquest across a fantasy world. Turn-based civilisation management and real-time epic strategy battles with thousands of troops and monsters at your command.

achievements.name: Loremaster of Hoeth
achievements.description: Playing as the High Elves, construct the White Tower of Hoeth.

achievements.name: Asur Ambassador
achievements.description: Playing as the High Elves, own at least 5 Elven Embassies.

achievements.name: Taxman
achievements.description: Have a gross income of 5000 gold per turn.

name: Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition
description: Emperor Edition is the definitive edition of ROME II, featuring an improved politics system, overhauled building chains, rebalanced battles and improved visuals in both campaign and battleEmperor Edition contains all free feature updates since its release in 2013, which includes bug fixes, balancing, Twitch.

achievements.name: In the Footsteps of Great Men
achievements.description: Complete a campaign chapter’s primary objective and all associated historical objectives.

name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion
description: Command a space-faring empire in Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion, the new stand-alone expansion that combines 4X depth with real-time strategy gameplay.

achievements.name: Initiate
achievements.description: Win the game as a Vasari player.

achievements.name: Master of Any Domain
achievements.description: Win the game as a Random player.

achievements.name: Capital Ship Captain
achievements.description: Get a Capital Ship to maximum experience level.

achievements.name: Squadron Leader
achievements.description: Own at least 100 Squadrons at once.

name: Total War: SHOGUN 2
description: Total War: SHOGUN 2 is the perfect mix of real-time and turn-based strategy gaming for newcomers and veterans alike.

achievements.name: Stranglehold
achievements.description: Your clan holds 5 provinces simultaneously on the multiplayer clan campaign map.

achievements.name: Serve with Honour
achievements.description: Join a multiplayer clan in Shogun 2.

achievements.name: Exceptional Warriors
achievements.description: Through the avatar system, get a veteran unit to level 4.

achievements.name: Commander of Commoners
achievements.description: Keep at least 4 ashigaru units for a whole battle without routing once.

achievements.name: Elusive Strike force
achievements.description: Have all your army, except the general, hidden simultaneously for more than 30 seconds.

name: America's Army: Proving Grounds
description: America’s Army: Proving Grounds is the official game of the U.S. Army and part of the highly acclaimed America’s Army game series. This free military game focuses on small unit tactical maneuvers and puts you to the test in a wide variety of new America’s Army maps and AA fan favorites.

name: Kenshi
description: A free-roaming squad based RPG. Focusing on open-ended sandbox gameplay features rather than a linear story. Be a trader, a thief, a rebel, a warlord, an adventurer, a farmer, a slave, or just food for the cannibals. Train your men up from puny victims to master warriors.

name: Project Zomboid
description: Project Zomboid is the ultimate in zombie survival. Alone or in MP: you loot, build, craft, fight, farm and fish in a struggle to survive. A hardcore RPG skillset, a vast map, massively customisable sandbox and a cute tutorial raccoon await the unwary. So how will you die? All it takes is a bite..

name: Foxhole
description: Foxhole is a massively multiplayer game where thousands of players shape the outcome of a persistent online war. Every individual soldier is a player that contributes to the war effort through logistics, base building, reconnaissance, combat, and more.

name: Dyson Sphere Program
description: Build the most efficient intergalactic factory in space simulation strategy game Dyson Sphere Program! Harness the power of stars, collect resources, plan and design production lines and develop your interstellar factory from a small space workshop to a galaxy-wide industrial empire.

achievements.name: Know any campfire songs?
achievements.description: Consume at least 40 wood by burning it.

achievements.name: Don't underestimate Plant Fuel
achievements.description: Consume at least 100 Plant Fuel by burning it.

achievements.name: I'm not tilted
achievements.description: Find and land on a planet rotating on a horizontal axis.

achievements.name: Infinite Factory I
achievements.description: Exceed a total energy consumption of 1GJ.

name: Red Dead Online
description: Step into the vibrant, ever-evolving world of Red Dead Online and experience life in frontier America. Chase down bounties, battle outlaw gangs and other players, hunt, fish and trade, search for exotic treasures, run Moonshine, and much more to discover in a world of astounding depth and detail.

name: The Sims™ 4
description: Play with life and discover the possibilities. Unleash your imagination and create a world of Sims that’s wholly unique. Explore and customize every detail from Sims to homes–and much more.

name: Rust
description: The only aim in Rust is to survive. Everything wants you to die - the island’s wildlife, other inhabitants, the environment, and other survivors. Do whatever it takes to last another night.

name: Middle-earth™: Shadow of War™
description: Experience an epic open-world brought to life by the award-winning Nemesis System. Forge a new Ring of Power, conquer Fortresses in massive battles and dominate Mordor with your personal orc army in Middle-earth™: Shadow of War™.

achievements.name: Forger
achievements.description: Forge a higher-quality Gem by combining three Gems of the same quality.

achievements.name: Best Defense
achievements.description: Equip 3 Siege Upgrades on an Assault Team.

achievements.name: Fit for War
achievements.description: Complete a challenge to upgrade a piece of gear.

name: Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT
description: A storm is coming. Venture into the complete Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR’S CUT on PC; forge your own path through this open-world action adventure and uncover its hidden wonders. Brought to you by Sucker Punch Productions, Nixxes Software and PlayStation Studios.

name: Age of Empires II (2013)
description: Age of Empires II has been re-imagined in high definition. With the release of Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition, this product will not be updated further.

achievements.name: General
achievements.description: You have sought glory in ten single-player battles, fight on!

achievements.name: First Victory
achievements.description: Congratulations!  You have achieved the first multi-player victory of many to come.

achievements.name: Loyal Ally
achievements.description: On this day you have fought in your tenth online battle!  Let the town bell ring and the villagers rest from their labors that they may toast your good health and leadership.   There will be many battles ahead, some victories, some defeats - but always lessons.  Cheers and congratulations to you on this auspicious day!

achievements.name: First Random Map
achievements.description: When you are ready to take on the unexpected you are ready to take on the world.  The Random map challenge is for any who are ready for attack or defense by land or sea and to defend against those who would threaten your empire.    Fight on!

achievements.name: You were the Most Valuable Player!
achievements.description: You have earned your first MVP award.  The Most Valuable Player in an Age of Empires II battle has the highest total buildings razed and enemy units killed on the team.  Aggressive attacks and thorough elimination of enemy buildings will increase your chances of earning additional MVPs.   Congratulations!

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the dark future of Night City — a dangerous megalopolis obsessed with power, glamor, and ceaseless body modification.

name: Men of War: Assault Squad 2
description: Men of War: Assault Squad 2 features new single player style skirmish modes that take players from extreme tank combat to deadly sniper stealth missions. Commanders can now faceoff against opponents on various new multiplayer 1v1 – 8v8 maps.

achievements.name: Introduction - easy
achievements.description: Complete the introduction on easy difficulty.

achievements.name: Introduction - normal
achievements.description: Complete the introduction on normal difficulty.

achievements.name: Beachhead
achievements.description: Clean the beach of enemies in introduction.

achievements.name: Ambush
achievements.description: Ambush the Japanese reinforcments in introduction.

achievements.name: Road Block
achievements.description: Clear the road block in introduction.

name: AdVenture Capitalist
description: Welcome, eager young investor, to AdVenture Capitalist! Arguably the world's greatest Capitalism simulator!

achievements.name: Earth Overlord!
achievements.description: Purchase the "Buy Earth" Upgrade on Earth

name: Horizon Zero Dawn™ Complete Edition
description: Experience Aloy’s legendary quest to unravel the mysteries of a future Earth ruled by Machines. Use devastating tactical attacks against your prey and explore a majestic open world in this award-winning action RPG!

achievements.name: Stealth killed 10 machines
achievements.description: Performed a stealth kill on 10 machines.

achievements.name: 3 Strikes From Above
achievements.description: Killed 3 enemies using the Strike from Above skill.

achievements.name: 10 Vulnerable machine kills
achievements.description: Killed 10 machines weak to Fire while burning, or weak to Freeze while frozen.

achievements.name: Headshot 30 human enemies
achievements.description: Killed 30 human enemies by landing headshots on them.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm
description: Insurgency: Sandstorm is a team-based, tactical FPS based on lethal close quarters combat and objective-oriented multiplayer gameplay. Experience the intensity of modern combat where skill is rewarded, and teamwork wins the fight.

achievements.name: Turf War
achievements.description: Block an objective from being captured and then clear it.

achievements.name: Flaccid Paralysis
achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies with a headshot in a row.

achievements.name: High Speed Low Drag
achievements.description: Kill an enemy right after performing a speed reload.

achievements.name: Thanks Station!
achievements.description: As a Commander, kill an enemy using fire support.

achievements.name: Point Shooting
achievements.description: Kill an enemy without using weapon sights.

name: GROUND BRANCH
description: From one of the developers behind the original Rainbow Six® and Ghost Recon® games, comes a thinking-man's first-person shooter featuring in-depth character and weapon customization. Take your time. Think ahead. Get the job done.

name: Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead
description: Three years after the conflict in Chernarus, portrayed in the original Arma 2, a new flashpoint explodes in the Green Sea Region. Coalition forces led by the US Army are deployed to Takistan to quickly restore peace and prevent further civilian casualties.

name: Sniper Elite 3
description: Sniper Elite 3 is a tactical third-person shooter that combines stealth, gameplay choice and genre-defining ballistics with huge, open levels and the exotic terrain of World War 2 North Africa.

name: War of Rights
description: War of Rights is a first person multiplayer game featuring massive 350 player battles with a focus on historical authenticity, teamplay and immersion. It is set during the perilous days of the American Civil War, in the Maryland Campaign of September, 1862.

name: Hearts of Iron IV
description: Victory is at your fingertips! Your ability to lead your nation is your supreme weapon, the strategy game Hearts of Iron IV lets you take command of any nation in World War II; the most engaging conflict in world history.

name: GTFO
description: GTFO is a hardcore cooperative horror shooter that throws you from gripping suspense to explosive action in a heartbeat. Stealth, strategy, and teamwork are necessary to survive in your deadly, underground prison. Work together or die together.

name: This War of Mine
description: In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: You are Geralt of Rivia, mercenary monster slayer. Before you stands a war-torn, monster-infested continent you can explore at will. Your current contract? Tracking down Ciri — the Child of Prophecy, a living weapon that can alter the shape of the world.

achievements.name: Shrieker
achievements.description: Complete the contract on the shrieker.

name: No Man's Sky
description: No Man's Sky is a game about exploration and survival in an infinite procedurally generated universe.

achievements.name: Foundation
achievements.description: Attain ‘Entrepreneur’ status in Most Units Accrued

achievements.name: Contact
achievements.description: Attain ‘Known’ status in Alien Colonist Encounters

name: Sid Meier's Civilization V
description: Create, discover, and download new player-created maps, scenarios, interfaces, and more!

achievements.name: Say Hello to My Little Friend

achievements.name: Two Men Enter, One Man Leave

name: Batman™: Arkham Origins
description: As of December 4, 2016, the online services portion of Batman: Arkham Origins will be retired. We thank those that have joined us to battle over the last 3 years. The Single player campaign may still be played and enjoyed offline. For any questions relating to Batman: Arkham Origins, please contact WB Games customer service .

name: Stellaris
description: Explore a galaxy full of wonders in this sci-fi grand strategy game from Paradox Development Studios. Interact with diverse alien races, discover strange new worlds with unexpected events and expand the reach of your empire. Each new adventure holds almost limitless possibilities.

achievements.name: Explorer
achievements.description: Survey one of each basic planet class

name: Wargame: AirLand Battle
description: 2 SIDES, 12 NATIONS, 750 UNITS: THE STRATEGY GAME REFERENCE IS BACK! Richer, more beautiful and more accessible, Wargame AirLand Battle is the sequel to the explosive real-time strategy game Wargame European Escalation! 1985.

name: Arma Reforger
description: Experience authentic Cold War combat and join the struggle for the sprawling, mid-Atlantic island of Everon and its smaller, offshore territory, Arland – or take on the role of Game Master and create your very own scenarios for others to enjoy.

achievements.name: True Grit
achievements.description: Killed 10 times by other players in any official game mode.

name: Battlefield™ 2042
description: Battlefield™ 2042 is a first-person shooter that marks the return to the iconic all-out warfare of the franchise.

name: LIV

name: Comedy Night
description: Tell jokes, sing songs, make friends or heckle. Comedy Night captures the fun experience of a real comedy club.

name: Phasmophobia
description: Phasmophobia is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you and your team to use all the ghost-hunting equipment at your disposal in order to gather as much evidence as you can.

name: Ring of Elysium
description: Escape an astonishing disaster in Ring of Elysium, a battle royale shooter developed by Aurora Studio.

name: Darkwood
description: Darkwood - a new perspective on survival horror. Scavenge and explore a rich, ever-changing free-roam world by day, then hunker down in your hideout and pray for the morning light.

name: Medieval Dynasty
description: Hunt, survive, build and lead in the harsh Middle Ages: Create your own Medieval Dynasty and ensure its long-lasting prosperity or die trying! Play alone or team up with friends to enjoy the ultimate medieval experience.

name: Magicka: Wizard Wars
description: No description available

name: Everhood
description: An UNCONVENTIONAL ADVENTURE RPG that takes place in an inexpressible world filled with amusing musical battles and strange delightful encounters. To put it simply: You are in for a ride.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Anniversary Edition
description: All of Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II in one package. Play the award-winning real-time strategy game in all its glory, including three full campaigns, six multiplayer factions, and a full co-op Last Stand mode with eight unique heroes.

achievements.name: There Is Only War
achievements.description: Terminate 500 enemy targets in Dawn of War II.

achievements.name: Death from Above
achievements.description: Kill 20 enemies using Assault Jump in Dawn of War II.

achievements.name: Sweeping Advance
achievements.description: Kill an enemy who is retreating in Dawn of War II.

achievements.name: Welcome to Calderis
achievements.description: Complete "Stand With Your Brothers" and "Retake the Hamlet" in Dawn of War II.

achievements.name: Rant All You Will
achievements.description: Complete "The True Enemy" in Dawn of War II.

name: Tiny Bunny
description: Tiny Bunny is a non-linear horror visual novel. Those, who have heard the voice of the forest, are beyond help.

achievements.name: Neverland
achievements.description: You spent the evening with your sister.

name: Dota 2
description: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover. With regular updates that ensure a constant evolution of gameplay, features, and heroes, Dota 2 has taken on a life of its own.

name: Holdfast: Nations At War
description: Fight on multiple fronts in Holdfast: Nations At War - A multiplayer first and third-person shooter set during the great Napoleonic Era and WW1. Charge into battle with over 150 players per server!

achievements.name: Sharpe' Recruit
achievements.description: Complete the T3 'Sharpe Recruit' field order.

achievements.name: Coward’s Gamble
achievements.description: Complete the T2 'A Coward’s Gamble' field order.

achievements.name: Not A Step Back!
achievements.description: Complete the T1 'Not A Step Back!' field order.

name: Ravenous Devils
description: A horror cooking simulator where the secret ingredient is crime. Improve your shops, buy new tools, expand your menu, and above all, make your customers happy.

achievements.name: A faulty woman
achievements.description: Make a new dress for Yvonne

achievements.name: In a better place
achievements.description: Find out where Elisewin is gone

name: Screeps: World
description: Screeps: World is an open source MMO RTS sandbox game for programming enthusiasts, wherein the core mechanic is programming your units AI. You control your colony by writing JavaScript which operates 24/7 in the single persistent open world filled by other players on par with you.

name: Bloons TD 6
description: The Bloons are back and better than ever! Get ready for a massive 3D tower defense game designed to give you hours and hours of the best strategy gaming available.

achievements.name: Hero Time
achievements.description: Deploy a Hero on a non-tutorial map

name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2
description: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 builds upon the highly popular DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE with enhanced graphics that will further immerse players into the largest and most detailed Dragon Ball world ever developed.

achievements.name: My Stomach Hurts!
achievements.description: Receive an SP Reward from Hercule.

achievements.name: In a Rocket Built For One Person?

name: Syberia
description: Join Kate Walker as she travels to remote locations and time periods in this timeless voyage to discover her true destiny.

name: Rising Storm 2: Vietnam
description: Red Orchestra Series' take on Vietnam: 64-player MP matches; 20+ maps; US Army & Marines, PAVN/NVA, NLF/VC; Australians and ARVN forces; 50+ weapons; 4 flyable helicopters; mines, traps and tunnels; Brutal. Authentic. Gritty. Character customization. And napalm in the morning.

achievements.name: Welcome to the Rice Fields
achievements.description: Finish a round on any map as the North Vietnamese forces.

achievements.name: FNG
achievements.description: Finish a round on any map as the US forces.

achievements.name: I Ain't Got Time To Bleed!
achievements.description: Kill an enemy whilst you are bleeding.

achievements.name: Survive!
achievements.description: Use two bandages in one life without dying.

achievements.name: The Gang Solves the North Vietnam Situation
achievements.description: Finish a game as part of the top-scoring squad in the game.

name: Starbase
description: Starbase is a hybrid voxel/vertex-based space MMO with a fully destructible and infinitely expanding universe, with a focus on building and designing spaceships and stations, exploration, resource gathering, crafting, trading, and combat.

name: Half-Life: Alyx
description: Half-Life: Alyx is Valve’s VR return to the Half-Life series. It’s the story of an impossible fight against a vicious alien race known as the Combine, set between the events of Half-Life and Half-Life 2. Playing as Alyx Vance, you are humanity’s only chance for survival.

name: Wasteland 3
description: Following the critically acclaimed 2014 Game of the Year winner Wasteland 2, the RPG series that pioneered the post-apocalyptic genre in video games returns with Wasteland 3.

name: Risk of Rain 2
description: Escape a chaotic alien planet by fighting through hordes of frenzied monsters – with your friends, or on your own. Combine loot in surprising ways and master each character until you become the havoc you feared upon your first crash landing.

achievements.name: Warrior
achievements.description: Reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event without dying.

achievements.name: Guidance Offline
achievements.description: Defeat the unique guardian of Siren's Call.

name: BattleBlock Theater
description: Welcome to BattleBlock Theater! You’ve got no where to go but up...on stage. Play single player or co-op to free your friends and save Hatty Hattington! Jump, solve and battle your way through a mysterious theater inhabited by highly technological felines.

achievements.name: Cast Member
achievements.description: Complete the story's opening sequence in any mode.

achievements.name: Black Marketeer
achievements.description: Get yourself a cool new weapon.

name: The Old Tree
description: The Old Tree is a short free-to-play cinematic puzzle game about a newborn alien baby. Witness this microscopic entity's first moments of life and help it emerge from its underground lair and ascend towards an unknown destination.

name: Star Trek Online
description: In Star Trek Online, the Star Trek universe appears for the first time on a truly massive scale. Players take the captain's chair as they command their own starship and crew. Explore strange new worlds, seek out new life and new civilizations, and boldly go where no one has gone before.

name: Northgard
description: Northgard is a critically acclaimed strategy game based on Norse mythology. Lead your clan, uncover the secrets of a mysterious newfound continent and defeat your enemies to conquer the Throne!

achievements.name: Wolf Hunter
achievements.description: Kill 20 Wolves in a single game

achievements.name: Squalid Living
achievements.description: Build a House in a swamp

achievements.name: Raider
achievements.description: Build 3 Harbors in a single game

name: Alien: Isolation
description: Discover the true meaning of fear in Alien: Isolation, a survival horror set in an atmosphere of constant dread and mortal danger.

name: Deadside
description: An Open World Survival Shooter blending hardcore PVP and PVE action. Secure precious loot in safe zones or build your own fortress in the wild. With intense gunfights, stunning visuals, and performance smooth enough for any system, the challenge awaits!

achievements.name: First step
achievements.description: Make you first step in game

achievements.name: Modder
achievements.description: Put any mod onto a weapon

name: Company of Heroes
description: Delivering a visceral WWII gaming experience, Company of Heroes redefines RTS by bringing the sacrifice of heroic soldiers, war-ravaged environments, and dynamic battlefields to life. Please visit the "Company of Heroes - Legacy Edition" page for additional user reviews.

name: Trove
description: Grab your friends, hone your blades, and set off for an epic procedurally generated adventure in Trove! Battle the Shadow in realms filled with dungeons and items created by your fellow players. Whether hunting treasure or building realms of your own, it’s never been this good to be square!

name: Human Fall Flat
description: Human Fall Flat is a hilarious, light-hearted platformer set in floating dreamscapes that can be played solo or with up to 8 players online. Free new levels keep its vibrant community rewarded.

name: The Sinking City
description: In the 1920s, on the East Coast of the United States, the half-submerged city of Oakmont is gripped by supernatural forces. You're a private investigator, uncovering the truth of what has possessed the city and corrupted the minds of its inhabitants... and yours.

achievements.name: Hook, Line, and Sinker
achievements.description: Solve your first case in Oakmont.

achievements.name: Deep Breath
achievements.description: Go below the surface for the first time.

achievements.name: The Pleasure of Finding Things Out
achievements.description: Use the intelligence archives in your investigation.

achievements.name: Extra! Extra!
achievements.description: Give an interview to the local newspaper.

name: Fallout: New Vegas
description: Welcome to Vegas. New Vegas. Enjoy your stay!

achievements.name: Ain't That a Kick in the Head
achievements.description: Complete Ain't That a Kick in the Head.

name: Ultimate General: Gettysburg
description: A Tactical Battle Simulator that allows you to command thousands of soldiers as a Union or Confederate General. The game features the most accurately created map, a non-linear battle campaign, complex morale, innovative control mechanics and smart AI.

achievements.name: Battle of Gettysburg medal
achievements.description: Honor award for fighting the battle of Gettysburg.

name: Black Myth: Wukong
description: Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend from the past.

achievements.name: Home is Behind
achievements.description: The old monkey has told his tale. Onward you must go.

achievements.name: Hammer and Hew
achievements.description: Armed head to toe, dread not the foe.

achievements.name: Brew of Bravery
achievements.description: Fresh brew in an old cask. May it stir a great task!

name: No More Room in Hell
description: The chances of you surviving this all out war of society and the undead are slim to none. Already, there are millions of the walking dead shambling about, searching for food to eat. There's no known cure. One bite can possibly end it all for you. However, you aren't alone in this nightmare.
developers: No More Room in Hell Team

achievements.name: Hypochondriac
achievements.description: In one life, take four bottles of pills to stave off a really bad case of death

achievements.name: Problem of Induction
achievements.description: You can never be too sure that your new gun is loaded with a full magazine

achievements.name: Hands Off My Man

achievements.description: Earn a Respawn Token while infected

achievements.description: Get 2 kills per 1 bullet from a whole mag of the JAE-700 without reloading

name: The Forever Winter
description: March Update is here! AI spawning and awareness are sharper, gunplay is smoother, looting is smarter, & network & performance are improved. Oh, & Water 3.0 is here! The in-game timer is gone, replaced with a new system you should check out. Plus, a brand-new map, Stairway Gate, watch your step!

name: Jurassic World Evolution
description: Place yourself at the heart of the Jurassic franchise and build your own Jurassic World. Bioengineer dinosaurs that think, feel and react intelligently to the world around them and face threats posed by espionage, breakouts and devastating tropical storms in an uncertain world where life always finds a way.

achievements.name: Going to make a fortune with this place
Shoot her!
achievements.description: Manually tranquillize a dinosaur with the ACU helicopter

achievements.name: Tenacious
achievements.description: Manually medicate a diseased dinosaur with the Ranger Team

achievements.name: It's all about control with you
achievements.description: Add a task for an ACU or Ranger Team

name: Spec Ops: The Line
description: A Third-Person modern military Shooter designed to challenge players' morality by putting them in the middle of unspeakable situations.

name: Creeper World 3: Arc Eternal
description: Creeper World 3 is what happens when cellular automata takes over a strategy simulation. Instead of discrete units that attack your base, a fluid-like substance spreads over the terraformable terrain. Your base, your weapons, your strategy... you must adapt them all.

name: Sekiro™: Shadows Die Twice
description: Game of the Year - The Game Awards 2019 Best Action Game of 2019 - IGN Carve your own clever path to vengeance in the award winning adventure from developer FromSoftware, creators of Bloodborne and the Dark Souls series. Take Revenge. Restore Your Honor. Kill Ingeniously.

achievements.name: Resurrection
achievements.description: Returned from the dead using "Resurrection" for the first time

name: ELEX
description: ELEX is a handcrafted action role-playing experience from the award-winning creators of the Gothic series, set in a brand new post-apocalyptic Science Fantasy universe that puts players into a huge seamless game world full of original characters, mutated creatures, deep moral choices and powerful action.

name: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is the award-winning, free-to-play Hero Shooter from Respawn Entertainment. Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities, and experience strategic squad play and innovative gameplay in the next evolution of Hero Shooter and Battle Royale.

name: Deadlock
description: Deadlock is a multiplayer game in early development.

name: Doki Doki Literature Club
description: The Literature Club is full of cute girls! Will you write the way into their heart? This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: Still Wakes the Deep
description: 1975. Disaster strikes the Beira D oil rig off the coast of Scotland. Navigate the collapsing rig to save your crew from an otherworldly horror on the edge of all logic and reality.

name: HITMAN World of Assassination
description: Enter the world of the ultimate assassin. HITMAN World of Assassination delivers the definitive stealth action experience, putting you in the shoes of Agent 47, a master assassin. Explore immersive locations, uncover hidden secrets, and eliminate targets with complete freedom of approach.

achievements.name: The Result of Previous Training
achievements.description: Complete Freeform Training in the Prologue.

achievements.name: Cleared for Field Duty
achievements.description: Complete The Final Test in the Prologue.

achievements.name: Seizing the Opportunity
achievements.description: Complete any Mission Story in The Final Test.

achievements.name: Unseen Assassin
achievements.description: Assassinate a Target without getting spotted.

name: Offworld Trading Company
description: Mars has been colonized, and Earth's corporate titans fight to dominate this new market. Competition is fierce in this fast-paced economic RTS from Civilization IV Lead Designer, Soren Johnson.

name: Into the Radius VR
description: Into the Radius is a single-player survival shooter in VR. Explore the Pechorsk zone filled with surreal landscapes and dangerous anomalies. Defend yourself with realistic firearms, recover strange artifacts, scavenge for loot, and uncover the mysteries of this unforgiving dystopian environment.

name: ELDEN RING
description: THE CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

name: Iron Harvest
description: A classic real-time strategy game with an epic single player campaign, multiplayer & coop, set in the alternate reality of 1920+

achievements.name: Special Forces
achievements.description: Attain elite rank with one of your units.

name: Pavlov VR
description: Pavlov vr is a multiplayer shooter in VR with heavy focus on community features. Realistic reloading features and fast paced combat as part of the core experience. Play the #1 most popular VR shooter on PC today.

name: Deep Rock Galactic
description: Deep Rock Galactic is a 1-4 player co-op FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, procedurally-generated caves, and endless hordes of alien monsters.

name: Robocraft
description: Build insane, fully customisable robot battle vehicles that drive, hover, walk and fly in the free-to-play action game Robocraft. Add weapons from the future and jump in the driving seat as you take your creation into battle against other players online!

name: Grey Hack
description: Grey Hack is a massively multiplayer hacking simulator game. You're a hacker with full freedom to act as you wish on a vast network of procedurally generated computers.

name: Dawn of Man
description: Command a settlement of ancient humans, guide them through the ages in their struggle for survival. Hunt, gather, craft tools, fight, research new techs and face the challenges the environment will throw at you.

name: Warframe
description: Awaken as an unstoppable warrior and battle alongside your friends in this story-driven free-to-play online action game

name: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
description: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin brings the franchise’s renowned obscurity & gripping gameplay to a new level. Join the dark journey and experience overwhelming enemy encounters, diabolical hazards, and unrelenting challenge.

achievements.name: Self Recollection
achievements.description: Reclaim flesh and set out as an Undead

name: HellSign
description: HellSign is an investigative action RPG that pits you against the horrors of the afterlife, let loose on a small town. As a hunter, you’ll plan, hunt, and kill to pay the bills and piece together the fragments to your past. Just remember - a smart hunter is always prepared.

name: Cities XL 2012
description: Cities XL 2012 now offers nearly 1,000 buildings & over 60 different, huge & incredibly detailed maps.

name: Gray Zone Warfare
description: Gray Zone Warfare challenges you with the first open-world extraction shooter emphasizing realism. Deploy with a Private Military Company, survive high-stakes PvEvP or PvE MMO battles against human operators and AI enemies, unravel Lamang island’s mysteries, and thrive through hard-earned progress.

name: Squad 44
description: Team up and join the frontline in Squad 44, the most authentic tactical WW2 shooter. Experience ruthless realism with an immense arsenal of faithfully recreated weapons and vehicles across massive WW2 battlefields.

name: 8-Bit Armies
description: 8-Bit Armies is a retro Real-Time Strategy game. With a colorful, blocky voxel art style, 8-Bit Armies is Petroglyph's most fast-paced, friendly, and accessible RTS game to date. Featuring a campaign of 25 single-player missions, 12 co-op missions, multiplayer and skirmish modes.

achievements.name: Fist Bump

description: Ready your pack, grab your walking stick and step into a world of mystery. Craft your character and immerse yourself in the enchanted lands of Braided Shore. Set your own goals and adventure alone or together with Travellers you meet on the road in this serene TMORPG.

name: Timberborn
description: Humans are long gone. In a world struck by droughts and toxic waste, will your lumberpunk beavers do any better? A city-building game featuring ingenious animals, vertical architecture, water physics, and terraforming. Contains high amounts of wood.

name: Grim Fandango Remastered
description: One of the most acclaimed adventure games of all time is now back, better than ever. Grim Fandango Remastered has the all the beautiful art and engaging story fans remember, but has also been remastered to look, sound, and control even better than the award-winning original release.

name: Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice VR Edition
description: The VR Edition of the critically acclaimed BAFTA award-winning Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice. From the makers of Heavenly Sword, Enslaved: Odyssey to the West, and DmC: Devil May Cry, comes a warrior’s brutal journey into myth and madness.

name: Monaco
description: Monaco: What's Yours Is Mine is a single player or co-op heist game. Assemble a crack team of thieves, case the joint, and pull off the perfect heist.

name: Age of Wonders: Planetfall
description: Age of Wonders: Planetfall is the new strategy game from Triumph Studios, creators of the critically acclaimed Age of Wonders series, bringing all the exciting tactical turn-based combat and in-depth empire building of its predecessors to space in an all-new, sci-fi setting.

name: Assassin's Creed Origins
description: ASSASSIN’S CREED® ORIGINS IS A NEW BEGINNING *The Discovery Tour by Assassin’s Creed®: Ancient Egypt is available now as a free update!* Ancient Egypt, a land of majesty and intrigue, is disappearing in a ruthless fight for power.

name: Battlerite Public Test
description: No description available

name: Syberia 3
description: The next generation in adventure games, Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters, you'll discover and experience a fabulous tale as imagined by Benoit Sokal.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
description: Assassin's Creed Odyssey is an action-adventure game where you choose the hero you want to become. Embark on an epic journey from outcast to living legend to uncover the secrets of your past and change the fate of Ancient Greece. Fight in visceral battles on both land and sea to become a true hero

name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider
description: As Lara Croft races to save the world from a Maya apocalypse, she must become the Tomb Raider she is destined to be.

name: Monster Hunter: World
description: Welcome to a new world! In Monster Hunter: World, the latest installment in the series, you can enjoy the ultimate hunting experience, using everything at your disposal to hunt monsters in a new world teeming with surprises and excitement.

name: F1 2018
description: MAKE HEADLINES in F1® 2018. F1® 2018 is the official videogame of the 2018 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™. Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path.

name: Assassin's Creed III Remastered
description: Relive the American Revolution or experience it for the first time in Assassin's Creed® III Remastered, with enhanced graphics and improved gameplay mechanics. Also includes Assassin's Creed Liberation remastered and all solo DLC content.

name: King of the World
description: King of the World is the gameplay from RISK in a Real-time strategy setting. Fight up to 12 players at once while scheming, backstabbing, making shallow alliances or simply conquer to become the last man standing.

name: Albion Online
description: Albion Online is a fantasy sandbox MMORPG featuring a player-driven economy, classless combat system, and intense PvP battles. Explore a vast open world full of danger and opportunity. Grow your wealth, forge alliances, and leave your mark on the world of Albion.

name: HITMAN™ 2
description: Travel the globe and track your targets across exotic sandbox locations in HITMAN™ 2. From sun-drenched streets to dark and dangerous rainforests, nowhere is safe from the world’s most creative assassin, Agent 47 in the ultimate spy thriller story.

name: Age of Wonders III
description: Age of Wonders III is the long anticipated sequel to the award-winning strategy series. Delivering a unique mix of Empire Building, Role Playing and Warfare, Age of Wonders III offers the ultimate in turn-based fantasy strategy for veterans of the series and new players alike!

name: Destiny 2
description: Destiny 2 is an action MMO with a single evolving world that you and your friends can join anytime, anywhere, absolutely free.

name: Crusader Kings II
description: Explore one of the defining periods in world history in an experience crafted by the masters of Grand Strategy.

name: Black Desert
description: Played by over 20 million Adventurers - Black Desert Online is an open-world, action MMORPG. Experience intense, action-packed combat, battle massive world bosses, fight alongside friends to siege and conquer castles, and train in professions such as fishing, trading, crafting, cooking, and more!

name: Mass Effect™ Legendary Edition
description: The Mass Effect™ Legendary Edition includes single-player base content and over 40 DLC from the highly acclaimed Mass Effect, Mass Effect 2, and Mass Effect 3 games, including promo weapons, armors, and packs — remastered and optimized for 4K Ultra HD.

name: Demeo
description: Adventurers, it’s time to unite! Gather your friends and battle the dark forces that have overtaken the world of Resolution Games' award-winning RPG dungeon crawler, Demeo. The next generation of tabletop adventure has arrived!

name: Demeo - PC Edition
description: It’s dangerous to go alone! Grab your friends and assemble a party, because plumbing the depths of Demeo requires strategy, cunning, and teamwork. An award-winning cooperative tabletop adventure for up to four players.

name: Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator
description: Here is a sandbox like no other. Create massive battles with absolutely no limits. Want to see 10,000 chickens fight an army of Romans?? Sure, why not. Want to see a company of WW2 U.S soldiers fight 11,000 Medieval soldiers?? There are simply no limits to the carnage you can achieve in UEBS.

name: Noun Town
description: Gain new vocab while playing a game! Learn 1,000+ words & phrases in a world that regains color as you learn. Test your skills with mini-games and talk to the local villagers. Learn Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Spanish, & more…

name: Lost Ark
description: Embark on an odyssey for the Lost Ark in a vast, vibrant world: explore new lands, seek out lost treasures, and test yourself in thrilling action combat in this action-packed free-to-play RPG.

name: Ghosts Of Tabor
description: Ghosts of Tabor is VRs only FPS PVP and PVE survival game where you will use your wits, skills and resources to survive. Inspired by games such as Escape from Tarkov and DayZ, featuring different scenarios from scavenging to looting and crafting. Will you survive long enough to make it out alive?

name: Rotwood
description: The world has been thrown into chaos, and it's up to you and your friends to battle the corrupted beasts of the Rotwood. Upgrade your gear, choose your preferred weapon, and hone your skills to defend your safe haven.

name: Incursion Red River
description: Incursion Red River is a tactical first-person extraction shooter set in war-torn modern day Vietnam. Exclusively single-player and co-op gameplay! Customize your loadout, complete contracts & extract, or die trying!

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
description: The critically acclaimed Vermintide 2 is a visually stunning and groundbreaking melee action game pushing the boundaries of the first person co-op genre. Join the fight now!

name: While We Wait Here
description: Share thoughts and hot food with your last ever clients, as you wait for the world to end.

name: Figment
description: Figment is an action-adventure game that invites you to explore a unique surreal universe filled with music, humor and multi layered narrative. Join Dusty and his ever-optimistic friend, Piper, on an adventure through the different sides of the mind seeking to restore the courage that's been lost.

name: Far Cry 6
description: Enter the adrenaline-filled world of a modern-day guerrilla revolution. With stunning vistas, visceral gunplay, and a huge variety of gameplay experiences, there's never been a better time to join the fight.

name: Metro: Last Light Complete Edition
description: No description available

name: Oh Deer
description: One Hunter, and up to four more friends disguised as deer, in this thrilling game of hide-and-seek where every move could be the last. Will you blend in with the herd or stand out? Oh Deer...

name: Arma Reforger Experimental
description: No description available

name: Sea of Thieves
description: Sea of Thieves is a smash-hit pirate adventure game, offering the quintessential pirate experience of plundering lost treasures, intense battles, vanquishing sea monsters and more. Dive in with this revised edition of the game, which includes access to digital bonus media.

name: Overcooked! 2
description: Overcooked returns with a brand-new helping of chaotic cooking action! Journey back to the Onion Kingdom and assemble your team of chefs in classic couch co-op or online play for up to four players. Hold onto your aprons… it’s time to save the world again!

name: Dark and Darker
description: An unforgiving hardcore fantasy FPS dungeon PvPvE adventure. Band together with your friends and use your courage, wits, and cunning to uncover mythical treasures, defeat gruesome monsters, while staying one step ahead of the other devious treasure-hunters.
